sentence: Arizona Congressman Paul Gosar, a Republican from Prescott, gave a brief video address, a far cry from last year, when he was the featured speaker.
author: Jim Small
title: Arizona Republican said white nationalists are ‘patriots’ and called for hanging political enemies

sentence: Prescott Republican Congressman Paul Gosar was listed as a “special guest” with the white nationalist American Populist Union at an event that will be on a date popular among white nationalists and Neo-Nazis: Hitler’s birthday.
title: UPDATE: Paul Gosar promoted appearing at a white nationalist social gathering on Hitler’s birthday -- but his campaign says he isn’t

title: Paul Gosar Is GOP's Designated White Nationalist

sentence: Arizona Rep. Paul Gosar, whom God created to conclusively disprove white supremacy, is trying to explain away his video appearance at shrieking anti-Semite Nick Fuentes’ white power-palooza carnival in February, and that explanation is just as craven as you might imagine.
title: Paul Gosar explains yet another appearance at a white nationalist conference by blaming his staff
